SearchInputDTO Data Type

This data type has been deprecated.

Holds the details of a search query. Used in the POST /rest/search endpoint.

This DTO class is deprecated in v28 and will be removed in v29. GET /rest/search and POST /rest/search are deprecated and being replaced by POST /rest/search_ex which uses a different DTO class to convey the inputs to a search.

Properties
name data type description
query string The search query.
rpp number The maximum number of results to return (anything more than 25 will be set to 25).
org_id number The org to restrict search to (null for all)
types array of string The types of object to restrict the search to (Incident, Task, Comment)
user_id number The ID of the user to restrict results to
incident_statuses array of string The statuses of the incident (open/closed).
task_statuses array of string The statuses of the task (open/closed).

Example

{
  "query" : "...",
  "rpp" : 12345,
  "org_id" : 12345,
  "types" : [ "...", "..." ],
  "user_id" : 12345,
  "incident_statuses" : [ "...", "..." ],
  "task_statuses" : [ "...", "..." ]
}
